greetingSubtitle: This issue is full of useful in-depth guides. Do you want to know how actually virtual DOM is implemented in React? Have you alredy read about building a grid from images with a fixed aspect ratio? And finally, do you know how your WiFi router works?

cards.title: Modern Fluid Typography Using CSS Clamp
cards.description: Author explores fluid typography principles, use-cases, best practices, implementation with CSS clamp function, and how to calculate the right parameters.
cards.author: Adrian Bece

cards.title: CSS Animations Tutorial: Complete Guide for Beginners
cards.description: This is a full syntax guide and interactive CSS animations tutorial for beginners. Use it as a reference to learn the different parts of the CSS animation spec.
cards.author: Louis Lazaris

cards.title: Building a combined CSS-aspect-ratio-grid
cards.description: The article contains a practical solution to the problem of building a grid from images with a fixed aspect ratio.
cards.author: Tim Nguyen

cards.title: GitHub will mandate 2FA to help secure the software supply chain
cards.description: GitHub will require all users who contribute code on the platform to use 2FA as part of its latest security improvements.
cards.author: Ryan Daws

cards.title: How WiFi Works
cards.description: Do you want to go beyond coding routing and dive into hardware world? Start with video explanation of how your WiFi router works.
